name: Car Parking: Modern Police 18
description:
Car Parking: Modern Police 18 is full of that content which will extremely lovable to satisfy your police officer passion. In this police parking game you are supposed to park your police car in an extreme expert driving way to complete the task and fulfil your lawful policeman duty. This police parking is also a test of your police driving skills which is a major feature of a great and brilliant police officer
Highlights:

• Police Car Parking contains different auto stopping missions
• HD design with a reasonable domain
• Different Game levels with stopping obstacles
• Free Customization of 3D autos
• Realistic auto controls, directing wheel, brake and rigging
